sentences.sentence: Terracing is one of important engineering measures on slope and field.
sentences.translation: 而坡面田间工程措施主要是修梯田。

sentences.sentence: Terracing not only increased average yields, but also significantly lowered their variability.
sentences.translation: 梯田建设不仅增加了粮食平均产量，也大大提高了产量的稳定性。

sentences.sentence: In this picture you can see the existing slope, terracing, and get an idea of what the slope use to be.
sentences.translation: 在此图片你可以看到现有的斜坡，梯田，并得到一个什么斜坡使用的想法。
